description.ko: 무한한 공허에 빛의 마지막 잔재가 삼켜지는, 고요하고 압도적인 우주 심연으로의 여정입니다.
description.en: A journey through the silent, crushing depths of outer space where the last remnants of light are swallowed by the infinite void.

prompt: Cinematic wide shot of a massive black hole event horizon, surrounded by swirling dark violet and deep indigo gas clouds, ethereal cosmic dust, hyper-realistic, 8k resolution, photorealistic, ominous lighting, intense gravitational lensing, deep space atmosphere, VOID-3 aesthetic
